mapper.insert: insert into cart_tbl(pro_num,mc_email,cart_amount) values (#{pro_num},#{mc_email},#{cart_amount}) on duplicate key update cart_amount = cart_amount + #{cart_amount}
mapper.select: select c.pro_num, c.mc_email, p.pro_name, p.pro_upfolder, p.pro_img, p.pro_price, c.cart_amount ,c.cart_amount*p.pro_price as unitprice from cart_tbl c inner join product_tbl p on c.pro_num = p.pro_num where c.mc_email = #{mc_email}
select sum(p.pro_price*c.cart_amount) as total_price from cart_tbl c inner join product_tbl p on c.pro_num = p.pro_num where c.mc_email = #{mc_email}
